alert.note: Alert for Eastern Franklin; Northern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 15 at 3:26AM EST until December 17 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 AM EST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Wet snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Along the Massachusetts and New Hampshire border totals may be as high as 3 to 6 inches. Accumulations confined to 1000 feet or higher. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Eastern Franklin MA and Northern Worcester MA Counties. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 AM EST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The combination of heavy wet snow and winds gusting to 40 mph may result in power outages.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
